title: Create Personalized Content Carousel
description: A streaming service wants to create a new personalized carousel on the homepage titled 'Top Picks For You'.

tasks.description: Define the logic for the new carousel: a mix of content from the user's favorite genres and highly-rated new releases.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent defines the content selection criteria for the recommendation algorithm.

tasks.description: Apply the new logic to a user's profile to generate a list of recommended titles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of 10 titles for the user's carousel.

tasks.description: Deploy the new carousel to the homepage for all users.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the UI configuration to include the new carousel.
